effect.x_y: Changes all Pokémon’s normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes all Pokémon’s normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.

short_effect.x_y: Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.

flavor_text.x_y: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
